options.name: Standard Wi-Fi Rental
options.description: Reliable Wi-Fi service suitable for general browsing and essential tasks.

options.name: Premium Wi-Fi Rental
options.description: High-performance Wi-Fi service perfect for streaming, gaming, and intensive internet activities.

options.name: Secure Wi-Fi Rental
options.description: Wi-Fi service with advanced security features to safeguard sensitive online tasks.

options.name: Flexible Wi-Fi Rental
options.description: Tailored Wi-Fi rental options to suit varying needs with hourly rental flexibility.

options.name: Custom Wi-Fi Rental
options.description: Personalized Wi-Fi solutions tailored to specific requirements for enhanced user experience.

options.name: Business Wi-Fi Rental
options.description: Enterprise-grade Wi-Fi service designed for businesses and large groups with dedicated support.

options.name: Traveler's Wi-Fi Pass
options.description: Wi-Fi service for travelers offering extensive coverage in multiple locations for uninterrupted connectivity.

options.name: Family Wi-Fi Plan
options.description: Comprehensive Wi-Fi service package for families with multiple devices and users, including parental controls.

options.name: Event Wi-Fi Rental
options.description: Temporary Wi-Fi service tailored for events, conferences, and gatherings with scalable solutions.

options.name: Emergency Wi-Fi Backup
options.description: Reliable backup Wi-Fi service for emergencies or as a secondary connection with automatic failover.
